Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Establishes the Cannabis Community Reinvestment Act
Summary: Establishes the Cannabis Community Reinvestment Act; includes requirements for cannabis operators; includes the obligation to reinvest in communities disproportionately impacted by cannabis prohibition including, if applicable, the community such operator is located in; provides for the review of reinvestment plans by the department of financial services.
LawCode: Amd ยง3, add ยง62-a, Cannabis L; add ยง312, Fin Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the cannabis law and the financial services law, in relation to establishing the Cannabis Community Reinvestment Act
